Operations¶

Purpose:¶

Texas holdem is a 1 vs 1-8 computer player game. the game randomly generates your cards. you’re able to to bet $1 - $1000. at the end of the game all cards are shown and a winner is returned

Link¶

[This is a link to gitlab](https://git.cybbh.space/170D/wobc/student-folders/21_002/truett/texasholdem/-/blob/master/)
